backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user-scoped profiles and goal tracking with access control, goal creation, retrieval, and completion toggling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend UI, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining a warm OKLCH color theme and light/dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing theme, authentication gate, profile setup, and navigation between Today, Goals, and History screens.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Responsive header showing logo, user greeting, navigation tabs, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: App layout wrapper providing background, header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper showing a login screen or loading state before rendering authenticated content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to load and save the current user's profile through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoalQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, archiving, and toggling completion of goals via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and warm-themed CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/screens/GoalsManagement.tsx: UI to view active and archived goals, create new ones, and archive existing goals.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryView.tsx: Displays goal completion history for a selected date using a calendar and daily goal data.
frontend/src/screens/TodayDashboard.tsx: React screen that displays daily goals for a selected date, handles loading/error states, and allows toggling goal completion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, features, requirements, and pending feature requests for the Daily Goals app.
